structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Contracts to do away with tolls.

text.section: Any city may enter into contracts for the purpose of doing away with tolls on bridges wholly or partly within the city.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 257, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secd. 3235g-1, 3235g-2.
